table_description: The table contains the information of the artists, creators
table_ddl: CREATE TABLE public.artist ( id int8 NOT NULL, full_name varchar(120) NULL, first_name varchar(50) NULL, middle_name varchar(50) NULL, last_name varchar(70) NULL, nationality varchar(40) NULL, style" varchar(50) NULL

table_description: The table contains the information of the museums, gallery, exhibition
table_ddl: CREATE TABLE public.museum ( id int8 NOT NULL, name" varchar(50) NULL

table_description: The table contains the information of the artworks, pictures, sculptures, drawings, exhibits
table_ddl: CREATE TABLE public.work" (id int8 NOT NULL

table_description: The table contains the information of the opening hours of the museums
table_ddl: CREATE TABLE public.museum_hours (museum_id int8 NOT NULL, "day" varchar(10) NULL, "open" varchar(12) NULL, "close" varchar(12) NULL )

table_description: The table contains the information of the subjects, matters, fields, contents
table_ddl: CREATE TABLE public.subject ( work_id int8 NOT NULL, subject varchar(50) NULL )

table_description: The table contains the information of the links to the image of the artwork
table_ddl: CREATE TABLE public.work_link ( work_id int8 NOT NULL, "name" varchar(80) NULL, artist_id int8 NOT NULL, "style" varchar(40) NULL, museum_id int8 NOT NULL, image_link varchar(256) NULL )
